comment.author: 77199267@N03
comment._content: Is this the oldest photo in the collection? This would have been taken only 12 or 13 years after the first portrait photos were taken. Amazing to see a photo of someone born 225 years ago!

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/77199267@N03] Not quite the oldest! We have another daguerreotype from this Duggan Collection that is circa 1843...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
